title: upcoming malz buff?
body:
"Patch 6.24 Summoner Spell Changes
Cleanse - nerfed

No longer clears supression"

well looks like next patch malz wont have to worry about qss anymore which is great. now if only the voidlings werent oneshot by turrets his laning phase would be good.

edit: i dont know whether this is true or not. but im hoping.

replies.body: i have now realized my stupidity and take my leave...

> [{quoted}](name=Stephenizgod,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PzHYEXcq,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-12-01T18:28:36.108+0000)
>
> Troll post is troll

im not trolling here is a link to the site: http://www.pcgamesn.com/league-of-legends/league-of-legends-patch-624

and i already stated that i dont know whether its true or not.

Ok then allow me to explain why this post makes no sense...  

You say its a Summoner Spell change  

>"Patch 6.24 Summoner Spell Changes  

See, right there.  

So why would that affect QSS which is an item?  

Not to mention Cleanse (the summoner spell) never worked on Suppression in the first place, it just never explicitly said so in the description.  

Furthermore Quicksilver Sash's Active is called Quicksilver which is different than Cleanse. I am guessing that change you are speaking of is not an actual change, its most likely a tool tip fix so that its clear that Cleanse doesn't work on Suppression.
That site interpreted the change incorrectly. Here's a link to all of the PBE changes http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/VPBE
Cleanse never cleared suppression, it just never labeled it as the only exception. QSS will still release you from the suppression though.

> [{quoted}](name=BateGamer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PzHYEXcq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-01T18:23:09.184+0000)
>
> Cleanse never cleared suppression, it just never labeled it as the only exception. QSS will still release you from the suppression though.

your statement is a contradiction. it doesnt clear supresson but releases you from it? clear=released

{{item:3140}}and{{summoner:1}} are two different kinds of cleanse, Qss will remove the suppression, but summoner cleanse never has been able to remove suppression. On the PBE, summoner cleanse is going to have its tooltip updated to include the fact that it doesn't remove suppression.
cleanse never got rid of suppression

> [{quoted}](name=warpenguin555,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PzHYEXcq,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-01T18:25:30.824+0000)
>
> cleanse never got rid of suppression

read my comment.
